edu.berkeley.me.jRonSim.house.userInterface
Interface UserInterfaceIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserInterfaceTask
public interface UserInterfaceIO

Defines the interface for how the UserInterface should communicate with the GUI.

Author:
William Burke
